original_title: Don't Panic: The Truth About Population
overview: Infographic documentary extravaganza with world famous Swedish statistician and showman Hans Rosling. His main message - that our world is profoundly changing in ways most of us simply don't realize - much of it for the better.
tagline: Our world is profoundly changing in ways most of us simply don't realize - much of it for the better.
title: Don't Panic: The Truth About Population
